whiskeys.name: 18 Year Old Single Malt
whiskeys.description: Soft fruit such as green apples and golden raisins as it opens, leading into bourbon-cask vanilla and toasted bread.

whiskeys.name: Cask Strength Limited Release
whiskeys.description: Aroma of delicate malts, bourbon and ginger. Notes of oak, caramel and baking spices dominate the palate, and lead to a rich finish touched by honey and fudge.

whiskeys.name: Blue Corn Bourbon
whiskeys.description: This whiskey has a full mouthfeel with tastes of sweet tea, burnt marshmallow, cinnamon candies, and marmalade, accompanied by a peppery finish.

whiskeys.name: Diamond Anniversary
whiskeys.description: The spice is upfront and combines forces with notes of wood, caramel, rye, cinnamon, corn, dried dark fruit, and a touch of honey.

whiskeys.name: Château Léoville Barton
whiskeys.description: The whiskey has a hint of cloves along with a fruity sweetness of green apples, rounded off with toasted oak.

whiskeys.name: John's Lane
whiskeys.description: Tasteful bodied spice front followed by vanilla, honey and dried apricot. The finish has a lingering honey sweetness on toasted oak.

whiskeys.name: 18 Years Old
whiskeys.description: Richly delivers luxurious dried fruit, candy peel and dates. Overlaid with elegant oak notes. The finish is warming, rewarding and distinguished.

whiskeys.name: 18 Years Old
whiskeys.description: Ths whisky tastes of dried fruits and ginger, with a hint of citrus, vanilla and cinnamon. Full and lingering with dried fruits and sweet toffee, ginger and a hint of wood smoke.

whiskeys.name: US 1 Single Barrel Straight Rye
whiskeys.description: The taste opens up with rich wheat, more sweetness like a molasses and lots of wood. Slights hints of light caramel with a bit of a herbal note.

whiskeys.name: Maple Cask Rye Whiskey
whiskeys.description: The whiskey is aged in maple syrup in the barrels. The result is a sultry, slightly decadent spirit that never loses its rye character.

whiskeys.name: Miyagikyo Single Malt
whiskeys.description: Using less peaty malt and distilled in a pot still heated by indirect steam, Miyagikyo single malt has an elegant fruitiness and a distinctive aroma with a strong Sherry cask influence.

whiskeys.name: 17 Years Old
whiskeys.description: With an amber color, this whiskey has fruity flavors such as peach, apricot, and melon. The palate has remnants of toffee, black cherry, and Mizunara (Japanese oak).

whiskeys.name: 2001 Limited Release
whiskeys.description: A strong Bourbon higher in sweet notes, vanilla, and caramel that finishes smoothly with oak notes.

whiskeys.name: Pact No. 2
whiskeys.description: With an appearance of dark, golden amber in color, this Bourbon tastes slightly sweet and spicy with a velvety smooth finish with a touch of Rye.

whiskeys.name: 16 Years Old
whiskeys.description: Dry peat smoke fills the palate with a gentle but strong sweetness, followed by sea and salt with touches of wood. The finish is highly reminiscent of salt and seaweed.

whiskeys.name: Portwood 21 Year Old Single Malt
whiskeys.description: Refined with remarkable character, the taste is creamy and silky with fruit, honey, and spice notes and a long and nutty finish.

whiskeys.name: 13 Year Straight Rye Whiskey
whiskeys.description: Complex notes of sweet vanilla, milk chocolate, roasted coffee and honeyed oak, all nicely balanced with a subtle spicy undertone, and lead a sweet, elegant finish.

whiskeys.name: Single Malt Straight Rye Whiskey
whiskeys.description: Racy on the nose with raw wood, raw grain, and a bit of hospital character. A little bit of peppery rye up front, it fades to a fiery, smoky, medicinal character.

whiskeys.name: 14 Year Old Single Malt
whiskeys.description: The taste is rich and fruity with hints of green apple and the zest of grapefruit. The nose is given depth by the Oloroso Sherry cask-aged whiskey.

whiskeys.name: Single Pot Still Irish Whiskey
whiskeys.description: Honey sweetness with pot still spices. Flavors of fresh coffee, creamy milk chocolate & Crème Brûlée. Notes of red apples & toasted oak.

whiskeys.name: Groth Cask Finish
whiskeys.description: This new finish adds a lush fruit flavor, and a soft, supple texture. Flavors of black cherry and blackberry blend with the spice of the rye and the toffee notes.

whiskeys.name: Single Barrel
whiskeys.description: The aroma carries lightly toasted oak, with dried figs and butterscotch. One sip brings flavors of sweetness balanced with tobacco and dark spices.

whiskeys.name: Rimfire Texas Single Malt
whiskeys.description: The nose of Rimfire brings about sweet tropical notes of ripe mango and dried banana with a hint of vanilla. The taste is smooth and delicate with a light malty sweetness.

whiskeys.name: '1' Texas Single Malt
whiskeys.description: On the palate, layers of toasted malt and honey give way to mellow notes of baked pears and apples. A long finish with cinnamon and cloves.

whiskeys.name: 21 Year Old Single Malt
whiskeys.description: Exceptionally smooth and mellow with a silky mouthfeel, finishes with hints of vanilla, honey, spice, and fresh fruit.

whiskeys.name: 18 Year Old
whiskeys.description: With a balanced and elegant character, this whisky has subtle bursts of sweet oranges and a long finish with spice and moist raisin notes.

whiskeys.name: 7 Year Old Barrel Proof Straight Rye Whiskey
whiskeys.description: Flovors of spicy butterscotch, hot maple syrup, orange cherry flavored gumdrops, licorice, and mandarin orange tea.

whiskeys.name: Rendezvous Rye
whiskeys.description: Rendezvous Rye boasts an uncommonly high 95% rye mash bill with an amber color, rich, spicy aromas of fruitcake, vanilla toffee, and baking spices.

whiskeys.name: 16 Year-Old Single Malt
whiskeys.description: A warm port sweetness on the back of the throat that forms an nutty fusion with hints of honey and praline on the tongue.

whiskeys.name: 18 Year Old Limited Reserve
whiskeys.description: Wonderfully mellow and smooth, a mouthful of complex flavor - fudge, toffee, spice, hints of wood and leather, vanilla and sherry nuttiness.

whiskeys.name: Sour Mash Whiskey
whiskeys.description: Flavors of maple syrup, caramel along with some floral fragrances and a citrus zest. Long, smooth finish with a high Rye content.

whiskeys.name: True Barrel Bourbon
whiskeys.description: It has a nice balance of vanilla with some slight citrus notes. Seems to feel pleasantly heavy on the tongue.

whiskeys.name: Indian Single Malt Whisky Cask Strength
whiskeys.description: Glorious bourbon notes fused with the richest of barley statements; Tastes of biscuit, fruit, citrus, toffee, and slightly tarry.

whiskeys.name: Coffey Grain Whisky
whiskeys.description: The profile is carnival candy filled. Some vanilla and cinnamon are added to the flavors found along with honey wine and peaches.

whiskeys.name: 18 Year Old
whiskeys.description: This is a beast of a whisky, with a breakfast character - granary toast, salty butter, a touch of orange juice and coffee.

whiskeys.name: The 15
whiskeys.description: The nose is of chocolate orange, potpourri, perfumed, fruitcake, and sherry. The taste profile with zesty orange, blue Curaçao, and chocolate.

whiskeys.name: Rye
whiskeys.description: The nose carries hints of citrus, caramel candy, maple sugar, vanilla oak, hazelnut, spice, and sherry wood. Finishes both sweet and dry.
A full-bodies rye with a the finish that leaves notes of oranges, vanilla, allspice, and warm caramels with a hint of dark chocolate and butterscotch.

whiskeys.name: Single Pot Still Irish Whiskey
whiskeys.description: Rich and aromatic with hints of sandalwood, mango, wood, and tea bags. The taste profile is of deep dark honey, marzipan, caramel, and fudge balance.

whiskeys.name: Single Malt Irish Whiskey
whiskeys.description: The nose is sweet and crisp with orchard fruits and a malty character. The palate is full and sweet with barley malt and hot buttered granary toast with honey.

whiskeys.name: Bourbon
whiskeys.description: A nose of rich dried fruits with vanilla, oak, caramel, citrus, and hints of peppery spiciness and cinnamon. On the tongue, a luxurious sweet flavor, reminiscent of tropical fruits.

whiskeys.name: Bourbon Sherry Cask Finish
whiskeys.description: Found the nose to be of maple syrup and caramel with grapefruit, finished in Oloroso Sherry Casks. Tastes of Rye spice with caramel, smoke and tobacco with vanilla.

whiskeys.name: Single Oak Project
whiskeys.description: The tasting profile of each Single Oak Project bourbon is truly unique, depending on the recipe, barrel seasoning and char level, tree cut, wood grain, entry proof and aging warehouse.

whiskeys.name: Noah's Mill
whiskeys.description: Soft, well-balanced with some complexity and good length. Found the nose to be of wonderful wood and forests with subtle notes of toffee caramel nose.

whiskeys.name: Very Old
whiskeys.description: A slightly fruitier and surprisingly sophisticated flavor profile. Finishes with a smooth, vanilla-infused elegance.

whiskeys.name: Single Malt Whiskey
whiskeys.description: Lots of fresh sweet corn, toasted almonds, allspice, nutmeg, toffee, cocoa, and cigar box on the nose and on the palate, with a lovely lingering finish.

whiskeys.name: Oregon Single Malt Whiskey
whiskeys.description: The whiskey opens with an attractive aroma of floral honey, peach and mango. Medium-to-full bodied, the aromas slowly transition to lush, ripe fruit, and brown spice.

whiskeys.name: Loch Gorm
whiskeys.description: Loch Gorm has a complex taste profile that combines rich sherry fruits and spices with smouldering peat, cloves, and lingering sweetness.

whiskeys.name: Single Malt
whiskeys.description: The taste profile is fruity and smooth with some organics lurking in the background. Smoke. Great, medium sweet finish.

whiskeys.name: Straight Rye
whiskeys.description: Tastes of caramel corn sweetness, mingled with butterscotch and licorice. The aftertaste is a soft mouth-feel that turns into subtle spices of pepper and tobacco.

whiskeys.name: 17 Year Old Single Malt
whiskeys.description: Mellow, well rounded, well balanced, medium intensity; a bright, elegant fruit and mildly spicy taste with a medium-long, clean finish.

whiskeys.name: Original Single Barrel
whiskeys.description: The taste profile is sweet with citrus and oak. A creamy vanilla nose features hints of nuts, caramel, orange, and light chocolate.
